metadata.title: CVE-2017-16844 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - high
metadata.description:
Heap-based buffer overflow in the loadbuf function in formisc.c in formailin procmail 3.22 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(application crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code via a crafted e-mailmessage because of a hardcoded realloc size, a different vulnerability thanCVE-2014-3618.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-16844` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

procmail - 3.22-21ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: procmail package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.22-21ubuntu0.2').
